abstract: Google’s service will allow users to sample music after they search for information. Facebook is adding songs through its gift shop.
snippet: Google’s service will allow users to sample music after they search for information. Facebook is adding songs through its gift shop.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Music fans are about to get two new ways to find and sample songs on the Web, as Google and Facebook introduce new features on their services.

headline.main: Facebook and Google Expected to Offer Music
headline.print_headline: More Music Is Expected At Facebook And Google
